events.message: The customer has submitted a claim for a vehicle collision that occurred last night on the highway.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident based on the reported collision details.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the vehicle accident claim promptly.
The customer received acknowledgment of the auto accident claim with estimated response timelines.
The customer was requested to submit police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates for the accident.
All requested documents including police report and damage photos have been submitted by the customer.
The investigation into the car collision circumstances and liability has been initiated by the claims team.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and damage extent consistent with submitted documentation.
A settlement offer covering the vehicle repair costs and applicable coverage has been proposed to the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and swift handling of their auto accident claim.
The claim has been officially approved following customer agreement to the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the vehicle damages has been issued to the customerâ€™s preferred account successfully.
The auto accident claim was closed after payment issuance and confirmation from the customer of claim resolution.
The record of the vehicle collision claim has been archived securely as per company policy and regulatory requirements.
